dca_creation_amount.description: Initial amount in native asset that sent on creating/refilling DCA to croncat to cover gas usage of agents

native_asset.description: Native gas/stake asset that used for attaching to croncat task

refill_threshold.description: Threshold when task refill should happen if it's lower during [`DCAExecuteMsg::Convert`] DCA will refill croncat task

AssetEntry.description: An unchecked ANS asset entry. This is a string that is formatted as `src_chain>[intermediate_chain>]asset_name`

Decimal.description:
A fixed-point decimal value with 18 fractional digits, i.e. Decimal(1_000_000_000_000_000_000) == 1.0

The greatest possible value that can be represented is 340282366920938463463.374607431768211455 (which is (2^128 - 1) / 10^18)
